document.full_text: the united states may release later on tuesday photos of osama bin laden's burial at sea but no final decision has been made, a u.s. official told reuters, speaking on condition of anonymity.
document.title: u.s. may release photos of bin laden burial at sea
lines_and_colors: the united states may release later on tuesday photos of osama bin laden's burial at sea but no final decision has been made, a u.s. official told reuters, speaking on condition of anonymity.
